messages.content: What is the purpose of comfyui-undistort?
ComfyUI-Undistort is designed to reverse the distortion in images, improving their quality.
How does the comfyui-undistort algorithm work?

The specific implementation details of the algorithm are not provided in the document, but it is safe to assume that it involves a mathematical or computational approach to identifying and reversing image distortion.
What types of images can be distored by comfyui-undistort?
The document suggests that the tool can be used to correct distortions in a variety of images, though it does not specify any particular type of image.
Is there any need for user input in the comfyui-undistort process?

The document does not mention any specific user input required for the comfyui-undistort process. However, it is common for such tools to offer adjustable parameters or settings which can be modified by the user.
Does comfyui-undistort support batch processing of images?
The document does not explicitly state whether comfyui-undistort supports batch processing of images. Typically, image processing tools designed for batch work would have a feature or option for it.
What are the advantages of using comfyui-undistort?
The document highlights the improved appearance of images after using comfyui-undistort, suggesting that it is effective in reducing image artifacts related to distortion.
What types of post-processing effects can be achieved with comfyui-undistort?

While the document does not detail specific post-processing effects, it could imply that by distorting and then undoing the distortion, certain visual effects related to the original image are enhanced.
